QuestData.Title: Upgrades in Ashran
QuestData.Description: You got some construction guides or assembly notes on ya? Oh man that's good news!$b$bI know this guy in Ashran, goes by Torgg Flexington. He's got finished blueprints we need!$b$bGo talk to this guy and bring back some good stuff for us to build, ok?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Torgg Flexington at Warspear in Ashran.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh YEAH buddy! We can work something out. I got plenty of stuff for you to buy!
